TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PixelFormats extends System.Object
public ref class PixelFormats abstract sealed

summary.span: Represents the collection of supported pixel formats.

span.span: Represents the collection of supported pixel formats.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr101010 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr101010 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: Gets the pixel format.
is a sRGB format with 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].
Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 10 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 10 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Uso do Atributo XAMLXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr24 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr24 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: Gets the pixel format.
is a sRGB format with 24 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].
Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse formato usa 24 bits de dados por pixel (8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] para cada uma de três cores primárias azul, verde e vermelho).This format uses 24 bits of data per pixel (8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] for each of the three primary colors blue, green, and red). Isso se traduz em 256 tons de cada cor primária para fornecer até 16 milhões de cores para cada imagem.This translates to 256 shades of each primary color to provide up to 16 million colors for each image. Para exibir imagens, o monitor e o controlador devem ser capazes de exibir as cores de pelo menos 32.000.To display images, the monitor and controller must be capable of displaying at least 32,000 colors. ## Uso do Atributo XAMLXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: Gets the black and white pixel format which displays one bit of data per pixel as either black or white.

span.span: Gets the black and white pixel format which displays one bit of data per pixel as either black or white.

value.span: O formato de pixel preto e branco.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Uso do Atributo XAMLXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Cmyk32 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Cmyk32 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: Gets the pixel format which displays 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] with each color channel (cyan, magenta, yellow, and black) allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

span.span: Gets the pixel format which displays 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] with each color channel (cyan, magenta, yellow, and black) allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks O sistema de cores CMYK geralmente é usado em tintas de impressão para papel.The CMYK color system is often used in printing inks for paper. Esse tipo de representação de cor é de cmyk o formulário (% C, M %, % Y, K %), onde K, M, S e C são os valores de porcentagem para os valores de ciano, magenta, amarelos e pretos da cor.This type of color representation is of the form cmyk (C%, M%, Y%, K%), where C, M, Y, and K are the percent values for the cyan, magenta, yellow, and black values of the color. ## Uso do Atributo XAMLXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Default As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Default { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: Gets the pixel format that is best suited for the particular operation.

span.span: Gets the pixel format that is best suited for the particular operation.

value.span: O mais adequada para a operação específica.

span.span: The best suited for the particular operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks é tecnicamente não um formato de pixel, mas em vez disso, uma maneira de acessar o formato de pixel mais adequada para uma determinada operação. is technically not a pixel format but rather a way to access the pixel format best suited for a particular operation. Esse formato é usado em situações onde o formato de pixel específico não é importante.This format is used for situations where the specific pixel format is not important. ## Uso do Atributo XAMLXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: This format has a gamma of 1.0.

span.span: This format has a gamma of 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Indexed1 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Indexed1 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: Gets the pixel format specifying a paletted bitmap with 2 colors.

span.span: Gets the pixel format specifying a paletted bitmap with 2 colors.

value.span: O formato de pixel que especifica um bitmap da paleta com 2 cores.

span.span: The pixel format which specifying a paletted bitmap with 2 colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Imagens da paleta usam uma tabela de cores que determina o uso de cores para a imagem.Paletted images use a color table which determines the color usage for the image. Cada pixel da imagem é mapeada para uma cor específica na tabela ou da paleta.Each pixel in the image is mapped to a particular color in the table, or palette. Cada cor na paleta é identificado por seu número de índice ou valor, que corresponde à sua posição na tabela.Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. O formato de pixel tem 2 cores disponíveis na tabela.The pixel format has 2 colors available in the table. ## Uso do Atributo XAMLXAML Attribute Usage ```

Cada cor na paleta é identificado por seu número de índice ou valor, que corresponde à sua posição na tabela.Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. O formato de pixel tem 4 cores disponíveis na tabela.The pixel format has 4 colors available in the table. ## Uso do Atributo XAMLXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Rgb24 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Rgb24 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: Gets the pixel format.
is a sRGB format with 24 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].
Each color channel (red, green, and blue) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

span.span: Each color channel (red, green, and blue) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse formato usa 24 bits de dados por pixel (8 bits por pixel para cada uma das três cores primárias vermelhas, verdes e azuis).This format uses 24 bits of data per pixel (8 bits per pixel for each of the three primary colors red, green, and blue). Isso se traduz em 256 tons de cada cor primária para fornecer até 16 milhões de cores para cada imagem.This translates to 256 shades of each primary color to provide up to 16 million colors for each image. Uma imagem é o mesmo que um imagem, mas os canais de cor (vermelho, verde e azul) estão em uma ordem diferente.An image is the same as a image, but the color channels (red, green, and blue) are in a different order. ## Uso do Atributo XAMLXAML Attribute Usage ```
